verses.roman:
ei-mata mahāprabhu prati-rātri-dine
unmāda ceṣṭita haya pralāpa-vacane

synonyms: ei-mata—in this way; mahāprabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; prati-rātri-dine—every night and day; unmāda—mad; ceṣṭita—activities; haya—are; pralāpa-vacane—talking like a madman.
translation: Each day and night, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu would become deranged in this way and talk like a madman.
